posts.post_content: Hello, Sorry if this is the wrong section to post this.  I'm wondering if anyone has had any issues recently with SGC cases cracking.  I had 10 cards graded back in the spring and 2 of them have developed cracks at the bottom of the case.  I called SGC and they said they've never heard of such a problem.  The cards were definitely not dropped.  Anyone else experienced this?  Thanks

Yes, I have it on maybe a dozen or so.

[URL=https://imageshack.com/i/pnIe6CsDp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/923/Ie6CsD.png[/IMG][/URL]
SGC cases are very flimsy. I once sandwiched an SGC case with cardboard, and the case simply cracked from the pressure.

[quote name="asoriano" post=1688634]Yes, I have it on maybe a dozen or so.

[URL=https://imageshack.com/i/pnIe6CsDp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/923/Ie6CsD.png[/IMG][/URL][/QUOTE]

Asoriano, this card is a piece of art, though, what a beauty!
